text:
Great job! The photos turned out perfectly!
They're really memorable and fantastic.

Thank you very much.
It's all thanks to you, Producer-san...

Haha, that's my line. But hey, can I ask why
you chose the park? It's a bit late, but...

Y-Yes... Well, um... I used to love picture books
with princes surrounded by stars...

...I often looked at the illustrations and liked them a lot.
When I saw this costume, it reminded me of that...

...From here, with the stars in the background,
we might be able to recreate that feeling...

...Producer-san suggested the theme park,
and I was really torn, but...

No, it's okay. Your artistic vision shines through,
and I think it's great.

...Anyway, the PV shoot is coming up in a few days.
Keep up the good work, Mano.

Yes...
I'll do my best for the PV shoot as well...
